full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BRUL GTOR GYI 'KHRID YIG ZLA SHEL BDUD RTZI'I CHU RGYUN SPEL BA'I 'OD DKAR GYI 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG LUNG DANG RIGS PA'I YON TAN GYIS THUGS RGYUD PHYUG PA, ^RGYAL BA'I SKU ZHANG RAB BRTAN DON GRUB RGYA MTSOS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ^SH'AKYA DGE SLONG BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA YI GE PA NI DAD CAN DAM TSIG LDAN PA DRUNG YIG BSTAN 'DZIN DAR RGYAS KYI BRIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
